content:
Hi, I just merged my first PR to mathlib Today (it was a task that was proposed to me on this forum).
I'm now wondering if there's a list of missing lemmas, theorems somewhere or if there are groups of people working on some theory that may like some help from a novice :) Thanks!
there are cofinitely many missing lemmas, that's a long list
what would be a good way to know where I can try to contribute?
